name: Mula: The Cycle of Shadow
description:
• Casual short game.
  • Enemies scale with the player.
  • Lots of secret rooms with game advancing items.
  • Watch out for gamepad vibration or visual cues if you play with a keyboard.
  • What primary item you get will determine your playstyle.
  • Do the achievements, they are clues.
  • Not so casual when you really play it.
TIP:Read the Game Guide or Manual for more info.
